snippet: Wall Street market indexes inched ahead as investors prepared for the start of corporate earnings season.
abstract: Wall Street market indexes inch ahead as investors prepare for the start of corporate earnings season, and European leaders discuss shoring up the euro.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street market indexes inched ahead as investors prepared for the start of corporate earnings season.

headline.main: Shares Continue Rally Ahead of Earnings Season
headline.print_headline: Shares Continue Rally Ahead of Earnings Season
